thread.title: Pope urges dialogue in Korea, nuclear ban

title: Pope urges dialogue in Korea, nuclear ban
text:
Pope urges dialogue in Korea, nuclear ban   01:43 
Pope Francis, in his annual ''state of the world'' address called on Monday for all nations to support dialogue to ease tensions on the Korean peninsula and to work for a legally binding ban on nuclear weapons.   
Pope Francis, in his annual "state of the world" address called on Monday for all nations to support dialogue to ease tensions on the Korean peninsula and to work for a legally binding ban on nuclear weapons.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/08/pope-urges-dialogue-in-korea-nuclear-ban?videoId=381239301&videoChannel=101
